languages.text: "Тот, с поврежденными имплантами... Возможно, они стали причиной, по которой бестия не стала выполнять приказ, данный ее собратьям — уничтожить носителей инфоклейма. А может..." {n}Соломон задумчиво поправляет ошейник Глейто.{/n} "Может, это был славный зверь, которому не повезло с хозяевами. Пока это была единственная достойная уважения встреча на Тассере".

traits.locale_text: "Киберласераксам приказали ликвидировать носителей инфоклейма. Этот не подчинился и набросился на представителя своего вида. На лицо критическая неисправность имплантов — или причины куда серьезнее".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "The one with the damaged implants... Perhaps they were the reason the beast defied the order that the rest of its pack followed — to destroy all bearers of data-brands. Or maybe..." {n}Solomorne looks pensive as he straightens Glaito's collar.{/n} "Maybe it was a fine animal that was unlucky enough to have bad masters. This is the first creature I've met on Thassera that has been worthy of respect."
languages.original_text: "Тот, с поврежденными имплантами... Возможно, они стали причиной, по которой бестия не стала выполнять приказ, данный ее собратьям — уничтожить носителей инфоклейма. А может..." {n}Соломон задумчиво поправляет ошейник Глейто.{/n} "Может, это был славный зверь, которому не повезло с хозяевами. Пока это была единственная достойная уважения встреча на Тассере".

traits.locale_text: "The one with the damaged implants... Perhaps they were the reason the beast defied the order that the rest of its pack followed, to destroy the bearers of data-brands. Or maybe..." {n}Solomorne looks pensive as he straightens Glaito's collar.{/n} "Maybe it was a fine animal unlucky to have bad masters. This is the first creature worthy of respect that I have yet met on Thassera."

languages.text: 「あの損傷したインプラントを持っていた個体ですね…もしかすると、あれが原因で群れの他の獣たちと違いが生じて、データ刻印の持ち主を全て抹殺せよという命令に逆らったのかもしれません。あるいは…」{n}ソロモーンは物思いに沈みながら、グライトの首輪を整えた。{/n}「もしかしたら、ただ運悪く、ひどい主に仕えさせられていただけの、立派な獣だったのかもしれません。タッセーラで出会った生き物の中で、敬意を払うに値したのは、こいつが初めてです」
languages.original_text: "The one with the damaged implants... Perhaps they were the reason the beast defied the order that the rest of its pack followed — to destroy all bearers of data-brands. Or maybe..." {n}Solomorne looks pensive as he straightens Glaito's collar.{/n} "Maybe it was a fine animal that was unlucky enough to have bad masters. This is the first creature I've met on Thassera that has been worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: 「あの損傷したインプラントを持っていた個体ですね…もしかすると、あれが原因で群れの他の獣たちと違いが生じて、データ刻印の持ち主を全て抹殺せよという命令に逆らったのかもしれません。あるいは…」{n}ソロモーンは物思いに沈みながら、グライトの首輪を整えた。{/n}「もしかしたら、ただ運悪く、ひどい主に仕えさせられていただけの、立派な獣だったのかもしれません。タッセーラで出会った生き物の中で、敬意を払うに値したのは、こいつが初めてです」

languages.text: "İmplantları hasarlı... Belki de hayvanın, sürüsünün izlediği emre karşı gelmesinin sebebi bu implantlardı. Veri damgası taşıyan herkesi yok etmek... Belki de..."{n}Solomorne, dalgın bir hâlde Glaito'nun tasmasını düzeltiyor.{/n} "Belki de kötü sahipleri olacak kadar bahtsız, iyi bir hayvandı. Thassera'da karşılaştığım saygıyı hak eden ilk canlı bu."
languages.original_text: "The one with the damaged implants... Perhaps they were the reason the beast defied the order that the rest of its pack followed — to destroy all bearers of data-brands. Or maybe..." {n}Solomorne looks pensive as he straightens Glaito's collar.{/n} "Maybe it was a fine animal that was unlucky enough to have bad masters. This is the first creature I've met on Thassera that has been worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: "Hasarlı implantları vardı... Belki de canavarın, sürüsünün izlediği emre karşı gelmesinin sebebi bu implantlardı. Veri damgası taşıyan herkesi yok etmek... Belki de..."{n}Solomorne, dalgın bir hâlde Glaito'nun tasmasını düzeltiyor.{/n} "Belki de kötü sahipleri olacak kadar bahtsız, iyi bir hayvandı. Thassera'da karşılaştığım saygıyı hak eden ilk yaratık bu."

languages.text: «El que tenía los implantes dañados... Tal vez ese fuera el motivo de que la bestia desafiara la orden que siguió el resto de la manada: destruir a todos los portadores de marcas de datos. O quizá...». {n}Solomorne se muestra pensativo mientras coloca el collar de Glaito.{/n} «Puede que fuera un animal excepcional con la mala suerte de tener malos amos. Es la primera criatura digna de respeto que he encontrado en Thassera».
languages.original_text: "The one with the damaged implants... Perhaps they were the reason the beast defied the order that the rest of its pack followed — to destroy all bearers of data-brands. Or maybe..." {n}Solomorne looks pensive as he straightens Glaito's collar.{/n} "Maybe it was a fine animal that was unlucky enough to have bad masters. This is the first creature I've met on Thassera that has been worthy of respect."

Es la primera criatura digna de respeto que he encontrado en Thassera».

languages.text: “这只异虎的植入物坏了……或许正是由于这个原因，它才违抗了它那些同伴遵从的命令，没去袭击带有数据印记的人。又或许……”{n}索罗蒙捋着格雷托的项圈，若有所思。{/n}“或许它本来就是只好异虎，只是运气不好，遇到了差劲的主人罢了。在整个塔瑟拉，它是我遇到的第一只值得尊重的生物。”
languages.original_text: "The one with the damaged implants... Perhaps they were the reason the beast defied the order that the rest of its pack followed — to destroy all bearers of data-brands. Or maybe..." {n}Solomorne looks pensive as he straightens Glaito's collar.{/n} "Maybe it was a fine animal that was unlucky enough to have bad masters. This is the first creature I've met on Thassera that has been worthy of respect."

traits.locale_text: “这只异虎的植入物坏了……或许正是由于这个原因，它才违抗了它那些同伴遵从的命令，没去袭击带有数据印记的人。又或许……”{n}索罗蒙捋着格雷托的项圈，若有所思。{/n}“或许它本来就是只好异虎，只是运气不好，遇到了差劲的主人罢了。在整个塔瑟拉，它是我遇到的第一只值得尊重的生物。”

languages.text: « C'est celui avec les implants endommagés... Peut-être est-ce la raison pour laquelle il a enfreint les ordres qu'avait reçus sa meute et qui consistaient à éliminer toutes les cibles désignées par la marque numérique. Ou alors... » {n}Solomorne affiche un air songeur tout en arrangeant le collier de Glaito.{/n} « C'était peut-être juste une brave bête qui a eu la malchance de tomber sur de mauvais maîtres. C'est bien la première créature digne de respect que j'ai rencontrée depuis notre arrivée sur Thassera. »
languages.original_text: "The one with the damaged implants... Perhaps they were the reason the beast defied the order that the rest of its pack followed — to destroy all bearers of data-brands. Or maybe..." {n}Solomorne looks pensive as he straightens Glaito's collar.{/n} "Maybe it was a fine animal that was unlucky enough to have bad masters. This is the first creature I've met on Thassera that has been worthy of respect."

Ou alors... » {n}Solomorne affiche un air songeur tout en arrangeant le collier de Glaito.{/n} « C'était peut-être juste une brave bête qui a eu la malchance de tomber sur de mauvais maîtres. C'est bien la première créature digne de respect que j'ai rencontrée depuis notre arrivée sur Thassera. »

languages.text: "Der Mann mit den defekten Implantaten ... Vielleicht waren sie der Grund, warum die Bestie den Befehl verweigert hat, den der Rest seines Rudels befolgte ... alle Träger des Datenbrandes zu töten. Oder vielleicht ..." {n}Solomorne richtet mit strenger Miene Glaitos Halsband.{/n} "Vielleicht war es ein braves Tier, das das Pech hatte, böse Meister zu haben. Das ist die erste Kreatur, die mir auf Thassera begegnet ist, die Respekt verdient."
